publicationStmt.publisher: March 1. London printed for John Wright, in the Old-bailey,

notesStmt.note: "In consequence of the distractions and calamities of the nation the Judges and Justices of Assize, and Nisi Prius, and Oier and Terminer, and Gaol delivery are not to execute their commissions during this Lent Vacation, on pain of contempt." -- Steele.
Title from caption and first lines of text.
The year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
